name: Msce-gsir.GitHub.com
body:
### Gao Qingwei
Graduate Students
 
Chemical Engineering

Nanjing Tech University

### Research interest
I am interested in the hydration behavior of ions, small organic molecule, ionic liquid through molecular simulations, I analyse the micro-structure and transfer behavior of these system.

### Publications
Yang Ruan,Yudan Zhu*,Yumeng Zhang,**Qingwei Gao**,Xiaohua Lu*, and Linghong Lu,[Molecular Dynamics Study of Mg2+/Li+ Separation via Biomimetic Graphene-Based Nanopores: The Role of Dehydration in Second Shell,*Langmuir*](http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/acs.langmuir.6b03001)

### Awards
SINOPEC BEST POSTER AWARD,*4th International Conference on Molecular Simulation*,2016

### Contact
Email:qingwei_gao@163.com

Research Group Website:[Molecular and Surface Chemical Engineering(MSCE)](http://msce.njtech.edu.cn/chinese/index.html)
